pci_app_add_configuration_label_descript: You can add labels to your app. This is useful for filtering or securing by token on a specific label.
pci_app_add_privacy_settings_item_restri: Access to your app is restricted by authentication.
pci_app_add_privacy_settings_item_public: Your app is publicly accessible through your URL or API. Anyone can access your application and the data attached to it.
Please ensure that you take great care with sensitive data.
pci_app_add_settings_port_help: The HTTP port your app is linked to.
pci_app_add_readiness_probe_description: To determine when your application is ready to receive a HTTP request, you can configure a fully-customised readiness probe (Kubernetes Readiness probe) by adding an API endpoint and port.
pci_app_add_readiness_probe_path_help_te: This is the API endpoint for the readiness probe. Must return a 2XX or 3XX status
pci_app_add_readiness_probe_port_help_te: Enables you to configure a specific port for this API access path
